hero.title: Simplify your content planning with AI
hero.description: Kuzamo offers an AI-powered content planning and publishing workflow for small teams. Manage your blogs, social media, and emails from one place.

about.title: What is Kuzamo?
about.description: Kuzamo is a comprehensive workflow platform that enables small and agile teams to plan, produce, and publish blog, social media, and email content with AI support.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Flexible plans during early access period.

ai_content.question: How does AI content generation work?
ai_content.answer: Kuzamo provides AI-powered content suggestions based on your brief and target audience. You receive tone, length, and style recommendations for blog posts, social media posts, and email topics.

platforms.question: Which platforms do you support?
platforms.answer: We provide integration with WordPress, LinkedIn, X (Twitter), Instagram, Facebook, and email platforms. New platforms are continuously added.

collaboration.question: What are the team collaboration features?
collaboration.answer: We offer content approval workflows, task assignment, comment and feedback systems, real-time editing, and version tracking.

analytics.question: Is there analytics and reporting?
analytics.answer: Yes, you can track your content performance, see which content performs better, and improve AI suggestions with this data.

languages.question: Is there multi-language support?
languages.answer: Yes, you can generate AI-powered content in Turkish and English. We offer language options suitable for your target audience.
